<|system|>
Task: schema_generation
Format: json_schema
<|end|>
<|user|>
Generate JSON schema for order with order_id (string), customer_name (string), total (number), items (array)
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"type": "object", "properties": {"order_id": {"type": "string"}, "customer_name": {"type": "string"}, "total": {"type": "number"}, "items": {"type": "array"}}, "required": ["order_id", "customer_name", "total", "items"]}
<|end|>
